topic.title: NEW SEX PARTNERS IN LAST THREE MONTHS INDICATOR (OPPOSITE SEX PARTNERS)
topic.shortdesc: An indication of whether the PERSON attending a Sexual Health Service has reported having new sex partners in the last three months.
